about_the_game:
Just War Trains is an online shooter where players control heavily armored trains, engaging in intense battles against an opponent. The game is set on tracks winding through various landscapes, and players must strategically maneuver their trains while aiming to take down their opponent's train. There are four different trains with different types of abilities. The primary objective is to outmaneuver and outgun the opposing train, using a combination of skillful driving and precise shooting. The game is available for free, offering a thrilling experience where only the most skilled conductor will emerge victorious.

The game is free to play, making it accessible to a wide audience. With its unique combination of train simulation and tactical shooting, War Trains offers a fresh take on the online shooter genre. Each match is a high-stakes duel where only the most skilled and strategic players will come out on top, turning every encounter into a thrilling battle for supremacy on the rails.

Are you in a fight with a former opponent? Was somebody being toxic and calling you bad? 1v1 them in War Trains and settle the debate.

War Trains takes skill, only the best come out on top every time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 470 with 4 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 with 6-8 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
